content: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Health, an encrypted workspace designed to connect medical records and wellness applications with isolated health memory.
ChatGPT Health currently serves over 40 million weekly users who utilize it to inquire about symptoms, test results, treatments, insurance navigation, and after-hours care.
ChatGPT Health is particularly used in rural and underserved areas for healthcare inquiries.

Discussions surrounding ChatGPT Health focus on its potential for clinical adoption, streamlining care, and building a health-data moat, alongside concerns about privacy, regulation, and startup disruption.
